doc.title: Encodian

application.doc: Enhanced document format conversion, OCR, watermarking, data extraction, redaction + much more.

doc.title: Convert to PDF Convert a document to PDF or PDF/A format - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360011123574-Convert-to-PDF

Image Clean Up (Document) Execute image clean up activities focussed on text based images such as Deskew, Rotate, Despeckle + more.
Image Clean Up (Photo) Execute image clean up activities for standard photo images.
